summary:
Hello,

I am a Computer Science Professional passionate about programming & delivering well-designed, correct, clean, test-covered solutions following Agile methodologies and XP.

I hold B.Tech Computer Science & Engineering degree with 5+ years of experience as Senior Application Developer in ThoughtWorks

Throughout my career I have had hands-on experience in creating solutions from design to deployment in a micro-services, distributed, highly scalable architecture.

In forever awe with the intricacies and patterns of Distributed Systems

details: Sentiment analysis of App reviews for a a leading travel company application.
Built dashboards to derive insights and smart feedback for the application developer team
Support for both Google PlayStore and Apple App Store reviews
Built using React JS and Java
The project was to Help Price Analysts in pricing the products on store shelves. Price recommendations were generated using a rule based engine.
Delivered Competitor based pricing solution to generate price recommendations.
Built feature to export ~1L prices to retail stores
Led setting up contract testing framework against 3rd party system to build reliability with 3rd party system
TDD & clean code champion for the project - reinforcing benefits to the client.,
Currently leading Real-time Push Platform that serves real-time data updates to over 1 Million concurrent connections to improve end user experience.
Led feature-toggle implementation to enable A/B testing across 100+ micro-services.
Optimized the performance by 47% and scaled the solution that currently handles 5000 req/sec with p95 of ~20 ms.
Led retail bank customer journeys like deposits, debit-cards, savings accounts & service requests
Built 15+ microservices from scratch for a team of 20 devs.
Created standards and practices for an entire program of 250+ devs to follow.
Handled Customer Escalations. Worked closely with SREs and Customers for Troubleshooting, Debugging & Resolving production issues
Improved ease of debugging in bank ecosystem by 90% by designed and implementing a unique Distributed tracing framework
The ever-evolving framework caters to a wide range of components like: microservices, mobile, web, redis, kafka, database, websockets.
Designed monitoring integration of 100+ micro-services using Prometheus & Grafana
Established Path to Production Roadmap and Architected CI/CD solution.
Managed weekly releases of over 100+ micro-services, web application & mobile app.
Increased developer efficiency to write CI/CD pipelines by 95% by designing a DSL framework on top of GoCD.
Increased efficiency of managing configuration, secrets, deployment variables by 80% by designing and developing Config-as-a-service
The solution manages, audits, compares configurations across 200+ microservices.
Co-Led disaster recovery planning & execution for entire production bank application ecosystem
Drived the 6 hour drill successfully with minimal downtime during switchover.

info: Acquired thermal facial data to detect Lie based on the interviews.
Extracted of Thermal Patterns as Features.
Classification into deceptive and non-deceptive features using machine learning classification algorithm.

projects.projectTitle: Workforce Management of the company KRISHI_EX
info: A Web application and Android application to manage job of field workers of the company.
The application provided scheduling of jobs to be carried out and verification system of completion of job
Supported 24 hour tracking of employee on map and customer feedback system
The project was built in Ruby on Rails and android studio

projects.projectTitle: Detection of Corrosion Rate using Image Processing
info: Detection of rate of corrosion of Copper plates when immersed in Ferric Chloride solution
Given sample images master sample as well as images acquired while undergoing chemical processing to remove material.
Found the surface area for which the material has been removed using Image Processing.
IOT based Baggage Tracking system for Air Passengers.
The application is real-time and offers an easy to use app, complaint lodging facility, monitoring, status of bag, administration of system, one-time check-in at airport.
Developed using XAMARIN (for Cross Platform application), ASP.NET, RFID tracking using RC522 IC, Arduino UNO, HTML, CSS and BOOTSTRAP for front-end and MSSQL as database.

projects.projectTitle: Automatic login and Attendance alert application
info: A Java application to automatically login into Moodle (Official college website for students and teachers)
The application checked attendance of the students and alert the interested people over e-mail
Developed using web scraping through JAUNT API
